analyzed: hetu hetu sampayutta duka hetu duka

original: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nana
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na

original: ca hetu nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca hetu na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta
